definition: to burn/to ignite/to light/fig. to spark off (hopes)/to start (debate)/to raise (hopes)
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Right now, Hockaday's prototypes put out only a few milli- watts of power.
sentences.chinese: 现在，霍克蒂的燃料电池原型只能输出几毫瓦的电力。

sentences.english: The promise of fuel cells for efficient, eco-friendly power generation has become a reality.
sentences.chinese: 承诺燃料电池的效率高，环保型发电已成为现实。

sentences.english: Nafion membranes have been most widely used as a PEM in fuel cells.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一种制作燃料电池膜电极组件的新方法。

sentences.english: The fuel battery become one of way solves this cause in many customers mind.
sentences.chinese: 要突破这样的瓶颈，燃料电池就成了众望所归。

sentences.english: A146 –presently this special provision refers only to fuel cell cartridges containing flammable liquids.
sentences.chinese: 目前仅指含易燃液体的燃料电池罐。

sentences.english: High performance solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) made by atmospheric plasma spraying (APS …
sentences.chinese: 一种固体氧化物燃料电池封严技术涂层应用发展。

sentences.english: Nafion emulsion method for fuel cell membrane-electrode-assembly (MEA) preparation was reported for the first time in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一种制作燃料电池膜电极组件的新方法。

sentences.english: The progress of anode electrocatalysts for direct methanol fuel cell in the recent three years is reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 阳极电催化剂是直接甲醇燃料电池最重要的组成部分。

sentences.english: The taxi driver is going on about new fuel cells coming out shortly.
sentences.chinese: 出租车司机在和我聊不久将投放市场的新型燃料电池。

sentences.english: Advances in anode electrocatalysts for the direct borohydride fuel cell;
sentences.chinese: 阳极电催化剂是直接甲醇燃料电池最重要的组成部分。

sentences.english: Domestic solid-oxide fuel cells are about the size of a dishwasher.
sentences.chinese: 内部固态氧化物燃料电池大概有洗碗机大小。

sentences.english: It is the first ofits kind to be fuelled entirely by renewable energy.
sentences.chinese: 这是第一个采用可再生能源燃料电池的机器人。

sentences.english: Fuel cells and Electrolysers can both be PEM devices.
sentences.chinese: 燃料电池和质子交换膜电解可同时为设备。

sentences.english: Yet for advocates of fuel-cell cars, hope springs eternal.
sentences.chinese: 而对燃料电池汽车的支持者来说，希望永远都在萌生。

sentences.english: The hydrogen is then recombined with the oxygen in a fuel cell to produce electricity.
sentences.chinese: 随后，氢和氧在一种燃料电池里再次结合产生电流。

sentences.english: Sulphur may poison a fuel cell.
sentences.chinese: 硫会对燃料电池产生抑制作用。
